name: znfi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: sylibr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0))

⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ → c1 ∈ Fin)
⊣ c2 =(Z/nZ ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)

comment: The ` Z/nZ ` structure is a finite ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)
